CustomField.formula: RIGHT(Month_Year__c,LEN(Month_Year__c) - FIND(" ", Month_Year__c) ) & "-" & IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c, "January" ),"01",null)& IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c,"February" ),"02",null)& IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c,"March" ),"03",null)& IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c,"April" ),"04",null)& IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c,"May" ),"05",null)& IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c,"June" ),"06",null)& IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c,"July" ),"07",null)& IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c,"August" ),"08",null)& IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c,"September" ),"09",null)& IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c,"October" ),"10",null)& IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c,"November" ),"11",null)& IF (CONTAINS( Month_Year__c,"December" ),"12",null)
CustomField.label: MonthYearForSurf
